parameters.query:
SELECT 
  fo.id,
  fo.name,
  fo.due_date,
  fo.estimated_amount,
  fo.obligation_type,
  fo.priority,
  fo.user_id,
  e.nome as empresa_nome,
  e.cnpj,
  e.regime_tributario
FROM fiscal_obligations fo 
JOIN empresas e ON fo.empresa_id = e.id 
WHERE fo.due_date BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '30 days' 
  AND fo.status = 'pending' 
  AND fo.alert_sent = false 
ORDER BY fo.due_date ASC, fo.priority DESC
LIMIT 50
